title: Did I just get hextech Annie?
body: So I just forged 3 keys to open my 3rd chest and I got a hextech Annie skin but I still need 2100 essence to unlock it permanently. I thought the only way to get it was to get 10 gems and forge to make the skin?

replies.body: Soooooo lucky! I've only got 1 rare gem atm =(

I've gotten like 6 champion shards (I own all the champions) XD
In the future can we convert our blue essence (For champions, and if owned all) into gems?
or 1000 blue into 100 orange?

Yeah I've gotten heaps of champ shards as well (I own all the champs too, been playing 4 + years and got 180k IP). We have already said that we want to do something for players that have all the champions but also use hextech crafting. So we are working on something for players like you and me.
As a Rioter doesn't your acc have everything unlocked?
nope =) I use the store regularly to unlock things. Hoping to get Hextech Annie one day

hahaha, That sucks man. To think my n00b friend might potentially have more content this game than a developer is hilarious... Wallet always wins tho

Wallet OP

Well, I'm not a developer =) I work on the community team!

I have all the content I really want.....except that elusive hextech annie.

A conversion system will be hard to do, As converting blue to orange could become extremely tricky.
Maybe offer another type of reward instead? 
So far some quick thoughts I've had is just Blue to Orange - Blue to IP converter.

Maybe a lot of if for icons?
Banners to be used in your profile? 
Like how ultimate skins grant banners.

I actually wanna work on my onw Icons and banners to be used on my profile, as I think that would be cool.

I just thought of trading (May as well if your going for the CS-GO + TF2 road)
Like I own all the champions but some of my friends don't, we can then trade Champion shards for skin shards.
Blue to IP converter would be pretty pointless. If someone has all champions, IP has little-to-no value. Especially for player like me who has all Rune Pages and all the Runes I'll likely ever need.
